Text:
Classification: Scripted
Genre: Drama | Family | Lifestyle
Status: New Series
Network: USA ( USA)
Airs: Fridays at 10:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: January 04, 2013

A day trader with a massive gambling problem is fired from his job six months after a bad trade costs his firm millions. Shut out of the job market, he and his beautiful, photographer wife retreat to a neighborhood on the cusp of gentrification. He finds an unlikely partner and starts to turn his life around in an unexpected way. (Source: USA network)

(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-34010)
I understand from another site that this is a failed pilot.
this is weird. friend tells me that they cancelled the show after this pilot. is it true?
